header.title: Missing co-negative form after negative verb.

body.description: The negative verb "$1" should be followed by a co-negative form.
The word "$1" is in the wrong case.
The proper noun "$1" should begin with a capital letter.
The word "$1" is wrong, you should fix it.
The case of word "$1" should be genitive.
"$1" galggašii leat genetiivva kásusis.

examples.ex: Mii leat dávjá ságastallan dan {diŋga} birra.

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be genitive.
"$1" galggašii leat genetiivva kásusis.
The case of word "$1" should be genitive or accusative.
"$1" galggašii leat genetiiva dahje akkusatiiva kásusis.
The case of word "$1" should be accusative.
"$1" galggašii leat akkusatiiva kásusis.
The case of word "$1" should be accusative.
"$1" galggašii leat akkusatiiva kásusis.

examples.ex: Máhtte lea {viđa} jagi nuorat go mun.
Dat šattai {guovtti} mehtera guhkit go galggašii.
Son vuvddii daid bohccuid {viđa} ruvnno hálbbibui.
Dat šattai {guovtti} mehtera guhkit go galggašii.

header.title: Locative instead of comitative plural
Lokatiiva dan sájis go máŋggaidlogu komitatiiva

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be locative.
"$1" galggašii leat lokatiivva kásusis.

examples.ex: Muhtimat olggobeale {olbmuiguin} dadjet ahte ii leat dárbu loddet.

body.description: The case of word "$1" should be locative.
"$1" galggašii leat lokatiivva kásusis.

examples.ex: Vaikko eanaš oassi {olbmuid} eai liiko sudno politihkkii, de dan eaba válde vuhtii Putin ja Medvedev.

body.description: The number of word "$1" should be singular.
"$1" galggašii leat ovttaidlogus.
If you use an -ot passive, you cannot use an agent in locative ("$1").
Go geavahat -ot passiivva, de it sáhtte geavahit lokatiivva ageantta ("$1").

examples.ex: Eanan gos barta čuožžu, eaiggáduvvo viđa {olbmos}, namalassii dan golbma vieljažiin, daid {oappás} ja sin {neabis}.

header.title: hallat passive should have an illative agent
hallat passiiva galgá illatiivva ageanttain

body.description: If you use an -hallat passive, you have to use an agent in illative case ("$1").
Go geavahat -hallat passiivva, de ferte geavahit illatiivva ageantta ("$1").

examples.ex: Prospero lea herttot Milanos Itálias, muhto rivvehallá {vieljastis} válddi.
Sámi álbmot, earenoamážit boazodoallu lea hirbmadit cuiggohallan dáža {mediain} go mahkká billistit luonddu.
